mapper.select: SELECT id, article_title, article_views, like_num, create_by FROM blog_article_info WHERE author = #{username} ORDER BY create_by DESC
SELECT COUNT(`comment`) FROM blog_article_comment WHERE article_id IN (SELECT id FROM blog_article_info WHERE author = #{username})
SELECT COUNT( `comment` ) FROM blog_article_comment WHERE parent_id IN ( SELECT id FROM blog_article_comment WHERE article_id IN ( SELECT id FROM blog_article_info WHERE author = #{username} ) )
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM blog_article_info WHERE author = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_article_info SET article_title = #{title} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE blog_article_content SET article_content = #{content} WHERE article_id = #{id}
